bibl.title: Prosthetea eis ton "Peri tou Stephanou" logon tou Demosthenous (ยง 217-218). Demokratous Aphidnaiou (?) psephismatos peri thusion sumplerosis (Pap. Gr. Hauniensis 114 v. st. 9-35).
